roleset.name: end, stop
roleset.note: TERMINATE-V NOTES: Comparison with 'end' andb'fire'. Member of Vncls stop-55.4. (from terminate.01-v)
TERMINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on terminate.01. Corresponds to Vncls stop-55.4. (from termination.01-n)

roles.note: End point might be TMP or LOC (from terminate.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Comprehensive Care, which-1 *trace*-1 terminated its agreement to merge with First Hospital, dropped 7/8 to 3 7/8.
example.arg: its agreement to merge with First Hospital

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: The insurance concern said all conversion rights on the stock will terminate on Nov. 30.
example.arg: all conversion rights on the stock

example.name: both args
example.text: In addition to being the only foundry of this type on the west coast, this also marked the company?s termination of the crucible-steel process.

roleset.name: cause to cease employment, firing
roleset.note: TERMINATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls 10.10. VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls fire-10.10. (from terminate.02-v)
TERMINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on terminate.02. Corresponds to Vncls fire-10.10 (from termination.02-n)

example.name: poor John
example.text: BigHugeCo terminated John from his position as deputy garbage collector yesterday.
example.arg: from his position as deputy garbage collector

example.name: arg 1
example.text: the restructuring will take place over a two - year period and will principally involve the transfer and termination of employees in our U.S. operations
example.arg: of employees in our U.S. operations

example.name: another arg1
example.text: The pilots are calling the incident a misunderstanding and appealing their termination .

example.name: all args
example.text: ... claims filed by Mr. Paolino related to the Company's termination of Mr. Paolino as the Company's Chief Executive Officer on May 20...
example.arg: as the Company's Chief Executive Officer

example.name: this usages goes in this sense, fyi!
